title: Nasa warning: 2025 FA22 asteroid nears Earth; bigger than Qutub Minar
description: Asteroid 2025 FA22, significantly larger than Delhi's Qutub Minar, will make a close approach to Earth on September 18, 2025. While NASA confirms it poses no collision threat, its size and proximity offer a valuable opportunity for scientific study. Traveling at approximately 24,127 miles per hour, this flyby allows researchers to refine orbital models and improve planetary defense strategies.

Prioritizing earlier, consistent mealtimes and a nutritious breakfast is crucial for overall well-being and longevity, especially as we age.

title: Orca Wiesblatt, 25: Star dies in crash — Rock Lobsters mourn fearless lead
description: Professional hockey player Orca Wiesblatt tragically died in a traffic accident near Nanaimo, British Columbia. The 25-year-old, recently signed with the Allen Americans, was remembered by his former team, the Athens Rock Lobsters, for his energy, toughness, and infectious smile. Tributes poured in, highlighting his on-ice skills and positive impact as a teammate, leaving a void in the hockey community.

These include rules about who can create Waqf. Also stayed is the process for designating property. The Central Waqf Council must limit non-Muslim members. The court seeks to balance interests while the law is reviewed.

description: Russia has issued a warning. It says it will target any European nation that tries to seize its assets. This follows reports that the European Union is exploring ways to use frozen Russian funds to support Ukraine. Russia considers any seizure of its assets as theft.

title: Savannah James: 'I never fully adjusted to the spotlight'
description: Savannah James, wife of LeBron James, maintains a low public profile despite her husband's fame, expressing discomfort with red carpets and TV appearances. She prioritizes family privacy while supporting LeBron's philanthropic work and athletic dedication. Together since 2004, they navigate life in Los Angeles, actively supporting their son Bronny's basketball career.

title: Not red meat, not butter: These 5 everyday habits may be causing heart attacks
description: Increasing evidence suggests that modern foods and lifestyle patterns undermine nitric oxide production, crucial for cardiovascular health. Refined sugar, starches, industrial seed oils, smoking, and antibacterial mouthwash deplete nitric oxide, increasing the risk of heart disease. Conversely, leafy greens, beets, garlic, citrus fruits, nuts, and regular exercise can boost nitric oxide levels and support heart health.

title: Gemini Nano Banana AI Saree: What it this new trend; how you can create photos
description: Following the Nano Banana AI 3D figurine craze, the 'Banana AI Saree' trend has emerged on Instagram. Users are transforming selfies into 90s Bollywood-style portraits using Google’s Gemini Nano Banana image editing tool. The AI crafts images with chiffon sarees, grainy textures, and golden-hour lighting, mimicking classic Bollywood aesthetics with popular styles like polka-dot and floral sarees.

title: Fans slam NFL’s Charlie Kirk tribute at Lambeau Field
description: The NFL and Green Bay Packers honored Charlie Kirk with a moment of silence before facing the Washington Commanders. Fans called it rushed and poorly executed, slamming the league for inconsistency compared to past public statements. Kirk, 31, was killed Wednesday in Utah. The tribute came as Trump vowed to award him the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
